## Properties

| Property      | Attribute     | Description                                 | Type     | Default |
| ------------- | ------------- | ------------------------------------------- | -------- | ------- |
| `placeholder` | `placeholder` | The placeholder to use for the input field. | `string` | `''`    |


## Events

| Event      | Description                                                    | Type                  |
| ---------- | -------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------- |
| `onsubmit` | Custom event dispatching the value of the input on submission. | `CustomEvent<string>` |
